name: Dr. Sarah Chen
title: Senior ML Engineer
bio: Expert in machine learning and deep neural networks with 8+ years of experience in production ML systems. Specializes in computer vision and natural language processing applications at Google.
specialties: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Python, TensorFlow, Computer Vision

name: Dr. Michael Rodriguez
title: AI Research Scientist
bio: Leading AI researcher focused on large language models and AGI safety. Published author with 50+ papers in top-tier conferences including NeurIPS and ICML.
specialties: Artificial Intelligence, Large Language Models, Research, Python, PyTorch

name: Dr. Elena Petrov
title: Head of Data Science
bio: Data science leader with 12+ years experience building ML systems at scale. Leads a team of 30+ data scientists working on recommendation systems and user engagement.
specialties: Data Science, Machine Learning, Recommendation Systems, Leadership, Scale

name: David Kim
title: Computer Vision Engineer
bio: Computer vision specialist working on autonomous driving systems at Tesla. Expert in real-time image processing, object detection, and deep learning for automotive applications.
specialties: Computer Vision, Autonomous Driving, Deep Learning, C++, Python

name: Anna Kowalski
title: Senior Software Engineer
bio: Full-stack engineer with expertise in cloud-native applications and microservices architecture. Leads development of enterprise-scale solutions at Microsoft Azure.
specialties: Software Engineering, Cloud Architecture, Microservices, .NET, Azure

name: Dr. James Wilson
title: Principal Data Scientist
bio: Data science expert with 9+ years of experience in e-commerce analytics and machine learning. Leads data science initiatives for Amazon's recommendation and personalization systems.
specialties: Data Science, Analytics, Machine Learning, Statistics, SQL, Python

name: Maria Santos
title: Data Analytics Lead
bio: Analytics leader specializing in financial data and fraud detection systems. Builds data-driven solutions for payment processing and risk management at Stripe.
specialties: Data Analytics, Financial Data, Fraud Detection, SQL, Python, Tableau

name: Alex Thompson
title: Senior Backend Engineer
bio: Backend engineering specialist with 11+ years of experience in distributed systems and real-time messaging platforms. Architect of Slack's core messaging infrastructure.
specialties: Backend Engineering, Distributed Systems, Real-time Systems, Go, Kubernetes

name: Lisa Zhang
title: DevOps Architect
bio: DevOps expert with 8+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Designed and implemented Twitter's global deployment infrastructure serving billions of requests.
specialties: DevOps, Cloud Infrastructure, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS

name: Robert Johnson
title: UX Design Lead
bio: UX design leader with 7+ years of experience creating intuitive user experiences for consumer products. Led design teams for major Apple product launches including iOS and macOS features.
specialties: UX Design, User Research, Prototyping, Design Systems, iOS Design

name: Sofia Andersson
title: Product Designer
bio: Product designer with 6+ years of experience in digital product design and user interface development. Designs engaging music discovery experiences for Spotify's 400+ million users.
specialties: Product Design, UI Design, User Interface, Design Systems, Prototyping

name: Raj Patel
title: Engineering Manager
bio: Engineering leader with 9+ years of experience managing high-performing technical teams. Oversees cloud infrastructure services at AWS serving millions of customers globally.
specialties: Engineering Management, Team Leadership, Cloud Services, Agile, Strategy

name: Jennifer Wu
title: Technical Program Manager
bio: Technical program manager with 8+ years of experience leading cross-functional engineering initiatives. Manages large-scale platform development projects at GitHub serving 100+ million developers.
specialties: Program Management, Cross-functional Leadership, Platform Development, Agile

name: Marcus Brown
title: Product Manager
bio: Product management expert with 10+ years of experience in enterprise software and CRM platforms. Leads product strategy for Salesforce's core CRM features used by millions of businesses.
specialties: Product Management, Enterprise Software, CRM, Strategy, User Research

name: Sarah Kim
title: Senior Product Manager
bio: Senior product manager with 7+ years of experience in marketplace platforms and user experience optimization. Drives product innovation for Airbnb's host and guest experiences.
specialties: Product Management, Marketplace Platforms, User Experience, Growth, Analytics

name: Emma Davis
title: Principal Designer
bio: Principal designer with 9+ years of experience in creative software and design tools. Leads design vision for Adobe Creative Suite features used by millions of creative professionals worldwide.
specialties: Design Leadership, Creative Software, Design Systems, User Experience, Visual Design
